attributes.title: Bugs
attributes.review: Took too long to install. Crashed everytime i click events.

attributes.title: The wooooorrrrrrrssssttt app everrrrrr!!!!!!!!
attributes.review: This keeps glitching and it gets worse ever second I don’t know why it keeps freezing it needs to be taken down.

attributes.title: Worst app I’ve ever used 🤢🤮
attributes.review: Absolutely horrible in every way. I truly don’t even know where to start. Just do yourself a favor and don’t download it.

attributes.title: Health
attributes.review: The one star I gave this boosted my mental health. I should thank you, but they’ll probably take this app down before I even get the chance 🥰

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: This app is literally so terrible. It glitches and it doesn’t give any positive information.

attributes.title: awefullllll🤮🤮
attributes.review: i decided to give it a try after reading all the aweful reviews and boy were they right. my phone was glitching and i had to go get it replaced. it took control of my house and would turn on and off all the lights on it’s own. it even painted an american flag on my dog. poor thing:( i do not recommend downloading this app.

O M G!!!!! do NOT download this app. upon entering the application, a crusty dusty rusty musty cheeto came on to the screen. like what? it was glitchy and hacked all of my information and gave it to china. THIS APP IS THE PROBLEM, not tik tok. so unless you want to torture your whole family and eat glass for an entire century, DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!! and for u bunker boy, TRUMP 2020!! that’s what i hope to see on your grave 🥳🌈👑🧚‍♀️ 

AND THATS ON...

p e r i o d. 

thank you for this psa :)

attributes.title: Absolutely horrible
attributes.review: It took forever to load wouldn’t even let me sign up I do not recommend

attributes.title: If I could leave 0 stars I would
attributes.review: Completely hacked my phone and crashed it after taking HOURS TO EVEN DOWNLOAD. It even charged me money. Don’t download worse app EVER!!!

attributes.title: literally the worst
attributes.review: honestly it’s so so bad, my phone screamed at me when I downloaded it. it was like, “he’s racist and homophobic and sexist and transphobic and classist and a fascist and the worst!!” I am deleting immediately
